dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class, used for training and evaluating machine learning models.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Ilya Sutskever
Geoffrey E Hinton
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset with over 14 million images labeled across 20,000 categories, primarily used for training deep learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
